Row.Text: Plate-forged mega ranges carve a hyper-arid world into stark basins and windward oases. Expect towering boundary cordilleras, savage lee-side deserts, and a handful of monsoon belts clinging to the mountains that feed them.
Temperate climate variant with milder weather patterns and reduced extremes. Same physics-based generation with adjusted climate parameters for a more moderate world.
Dramatic tectonic variant featuring a massive central continent with a north-south convergent ridge and flanking rifts. Extreme geography with pronounced mountain chains and rift valleys.
